Prerequisite: 11th level, tiefling, rogue, Sneak Attack class feature

Benefit: When you deal your Sneak Attack damage, you can expend your infernal wrath to deal 1d6 extra fire damage for each die of Sneak Attack damage you deal.

Update (4/9/2010)

Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: "When you deal your Sneak Attack damage, you can expend your infernal wrath to deal 1d6 extra fire damage for each die of Sneak Attack damage you deal."

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 144.
